TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ReaderModificationCommandBatch extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.ModificationCommandBatch
Public MustInherit Class ReaderModificationCommandBatch Inherits ModificationCommandBatch

summary.para: A base class for implementations that make use of a data reader.
This type is typically used by database providers; it is generally not used in application code.

Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
